body:
The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.

body: It's very little to do with that. It's mostly because of social norms and "moral" expectations that men entreat women to everything. Sometimes it's because they're the "weaker" sex, other times it's because they're "oppressed" but it's all a tactic for the same goal. This is hardly going away anytime soon. The instinct to care about women 1000x more than men is deeply rooted in biology and the order of nature and reproduction. Despite their pride humans are still animals acting on instinct, it's just a lot more social and violent than normal. Probably the only reason I can see this is bullshit is because I have autism which basically makes me a different species. Even still I feel some primal urges, and automatically caring about something I recognize as female more than the opposite is one of them. But it's almost seperate from my conscious mind and I think almost everything humans do is dumb. *Literally* their excuse for everything is "Because, now fall in line or else".

body:
> People talk about all the ways that men can get their power back. The incel crowd for example think that you should just not participate.

That's called MGTOW, not Incel, incel means involuntarily celibate and these are guys who honestly believe they're too ugly/insecure to date women for whichever reasons and it's out of their hands, MGTOW means Men Going Their Own Way.

body: I'm not really a MGTOW, I don't think women are inherently bad, it's just that they're treated more special since birth and it's ingrained into their skulls just as much as men are trained to be deeply ashamed of anything associated with the opposite sex.  I feel like there's *too much* intentional separation between the sexes because of human fetishes, and that's just annoying and inefficient and generally unfair, especially for men who are expected to respect this order with their life.

body:
When I read your post I was reminded of a story I heard years ago. I think it was Pilipino story? Anyway... It was told by a traveler or priest who came to the village only once or twice a year. There was this young woman in the village who wasn't attractive. Not necessarily downright Ugly, but she wasn't what most men would want. All the other young women in the village married, but her. No one wanted her. Then, a young man came from another village and promptly courted her as if she were the most beautiful woman he'd ever seen. He treated her as if she were Beautiful, and worthy. 

A year or so later the traveler comes back to the village and stopped at the young man's farm. He was greeted kindly and asked to stay for dinner. The wife served him and he was extremely confused. This woman was Beautiful. Really beautiful. He thought maybe the young man's wife had died and he'd remarried, but he didn't want to seem rude and ask. He waited until the woman went to bed and the men were left to talk. Finally he was able to ask, Is that your second wife? What happened to the first woman you married? 

And they young man smiled in utter contentment and happiness and answered, That is my first wife. 

The priest was flummoxed. But, that woman had been plain and terribly unattractive. And the young man said, She was always beautiful. She just needed someone to convince her of it. Now I have the most beautiful wife in the whole village. 

Every woman is high value. You simply lack the wisdom to see it. That isn't the fault of the woman. That's a fault in your own soul. When you treat people the way they should be treated--that is, you treat Everyone with respect and kindness and as if they're beautiful, people rise to the occasion and become beautiful. Even a whore can be an amazing wife, and a virgin can be a complete nightmare. And yes, you are an asshole. As long as you're an asshole, you will never find a beautiful woman, or someone worthy, because you, yourself, are incapable of seeing how worthy they are.

A woman will date a man regardless of his looks and still love him. High value isn't just looks, you superficial ass. It's their behavior and how they treat themselves. Are they alcoholics? Drug Addicts? Blobs that can't stop eating? Why should I treat them any differently? They hate themselves, what would they think of someone that treats them like a queen?

If you think 'gosh just be nice to someone and they'll turn out beautiful!' you've never dealt with drug addicts.

HEY EVERYONE!!! ALL WE HAVE TO DO IS TREAT PEOPLE NICE AND EVERYTHING WORKS OUT FINE!!! I WAS THE PROBLEM THE WHOLE TIME! I HAVE A FAULT IN MY SOUL!

dumb fucking retard. Fuck you

post.body:
The reason they do is because women are sexually selective, and they know most men badly want pussy, so they will use this to manipulate them. Even good people will do this because no one ever taught them it's wrong. The other, probably even bigger reason is because of the Women Are Wonderful Effect. This is the phenomenon where both sexes instinctively care about females but not males. The reason for this is simple: you only need one male to impregnate thousands of females and have a lot of babies. But thousands of males and one female can still only produce one (or a few) babies.

Most people support this because humans have a fetish for it deeply ingrained into their DNA. But in reality it doesn't work out too well and results in simping and failed marriages motivated by sexual desire, and it's very annoying and unfair to people who are asexual or deviate from gender norms. If the exact same person were born the opposite sex, they'd get exponentially more or less sympathy and help from others simply because of that, not because of anything they did or didn't do to deserve it.
